name: Chainsaw Dance
summary:
Uh oh! It seems you are on a date with the Chainsaw Man!
He dismembers everything, and besides, you hardly understand what he is saying. Will you survive this date?

Chainsaw Dance is a short rhythm game based on the manga.
This DEMO includes 1 song.
info:
• 平台: WEB
  • 平台: PC
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2020-01-18
  • 开发: Benedique
  • 官方网站: benedique.itch.io/chainsaw-dance
